segments.text: Welcome to IBA . What can I do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to pay some money in using my card , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . Could you let me have your card and the money to be deposited ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here it is . I usually use the machine , but there seems to be such a long queue at the moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it's the same every day during the lunchtime rush . We will be putting in a new ATM in the near future , though . That should help to ease the queues .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll look forward to that , I can't stand queuing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know what you mean . How much would you like to deposit with us today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 1,000 RIB , it should all be there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's correct , 1,000 RIB . I'll need your personal code to deposit this . Could you enter it on this key pad , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , done . When will it show in my account ? Not for withdrawal , I mean just registered .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It will show in your account straight away . Here's your card back and could you please sign the slip here ?
segments.speaker: S1
